casebody.data:
Monday, December 13, 1993

MOTION DOCKET

93-493. State v. Lowe.

Logan County, No. 8-92-36. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Logan County. Upon consideration of the motion of the Ohio Association of Criminal Defense Lawyers for leave to file brief amicus curiae instanter,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for leave to file brief amicus curiae instanter be, and the same is hereby, granted, effective December 9, 1993.
